Articles.Content: Thanks to TreeEdit, which I officially nickname TreeMessIt, I can't even use KSP any more in career mode, which is bad for me, because career mode is all I play. Sandbox mode is boring. All the tree nodes are there, but they are all empty. Entirely empty. Urgh, this is so frustrating, I can't even have fun playing KSP anymore. Some mods, you can trust, but mods like these, are just scams.

I apologize for not knowing what your problem is, and now knowing how to help,

but...

This is the most reliable mod I've ever used. I've never even seean anyone else have a problem with it.

Thanks to TreeEdit, which I officially nickname TreeMessIt, I can't even use KSP any more in career mode, which is bad for me, because career mode is all I play. Sandbox mode is boring. All the tree nodes are there, but they are all empty. Entirely empty. Urgh, this is so frustrating, I can't even have fun playing KSP anymore. Some mods, you can trust, but mods like these, are just scams.

Actually, its not a scam, if you don't know how to install mods doesn't mean its a scam.

TreeEdit is bugged if i remember correctly, Treeloader works if you want to load another techtree, but don't use TreeEdit, it doesn't work

Actually, its not a scam, if you don't know how to install mods doesn't mean its a scam.

TreeEdit is bugged if i remember correctly, Treeloader works if you want to load another techtree, but don't use TreeEdit, it doesn't work

It might have been treeloader, i don't remember, since i have already deleted KSP. I'll redownload it when I feel like it.
